reviewText: Got this for my wife - a big Howard Keel fan.  She loved it.  Wish it were longer - wasn't he on with Carol Lawrence too?
Very good performance,of the actors,the music,pity it was very short,anyway I enjoied it very much it made me remember the goldenage of Hollywood.

Any Howard Keel product is automatically great. This is no exception. He is in fine voice with a great selection. The shame is that it is only 37 minutes. There is at least 90 minutes of his performances on Bell Telephone Hour shows. How about a part 2 to complete the record for his many fans.  Bryan Baker
